section.1: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ali bin Abu Talib that:The Prophet said: "Whoever leaves an area the size of a hair on his body and does not cleanse it from sexual impurity, such and such will be done to him in the Fire." 'Ali said: "Because of that I am hostile towards my hair," and he used to shave his head
